title: Greek Teacher Training Course for Strengthening Collaborative Writing Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Greek grammar and teaching experience
context.additional_context: Teacher professional development program applying MOOCs and collaborative learning methodologies in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners acquire the ability to design collaborative writing activities using Google Docs.
Learners gain experience in building a connectivist learning community for knowledge sharing among teachers.
Learners cultivate the ability to develop digital educational scenarios to enhance learner engagement.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
